document_data.name: Ranaghax Auvryndar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ranaghax Auvryndar''' was a [[drow]] member of [[House Auvryndar]] in the drow settlement in the [[Sargauth Level]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Ranaghax was a warrior and a son of Matron Mother [[Vlonwelv Auvryndar]].

In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Ranaghax was off-duty with six of his soldiers and he was reenacting a one-on-one battle he'd fought against a [[hobgoblin]] captain.
document_data.Activities: Ranaghax led a contingent of twelve drow warriors under the orders of his older sister [[T'rissa Auvryndar]].
document_data.Personality: Ranaghax knew very well his subordinate position in drow hierarchy and waited for the right time to fight.
